dataConfig.script: function skill_keywords(row) { var name = row.get('user_id'); var value = row.get('keywords'); row.put('keywords_s', value); return row; }

entity.name: service
entity.query: select service_id as id, organization_id, title, description, owner_id, tags, specifications, project_id, type, parent, published FROM service

entity.name: company
entity.query: select name as company_name, description as company_description FROM organization where organization_id = '${service.organization_id}'

entity.name: owner
entity.query: select user_name as owner_user_name, realname as owner_realname FROM users where user_id = '${service.owner_id}'

entity.name: service_interface
entity.query: select name as service_interface_name FROM service_interface WHERE service_id = '${service.id}'
